answers: There is little relevance as the area is only prohibited to powered aircraft.
Flight within the published dimensions of the area is prohibited.
Landing within the area is prohibited.

30 minutes before sunrise until 30 minutes after sunset.
30 minutes after sunrise until 30 minutes before sunset.
Sunrise until sunset.

The lower aircraft. ( unless the other is obviously in distress ).

Turn in the same direction.

Change your route to remain clear of the airway during the notified period.

question: An area on a 1:500,000 scale ICAO chart is annotated as being a Danger area. What does this mean with regards to a glider in flight?

Flight within the published dimensions is prohibited.

question: What does a double white cross ( ++ ) showing on a runway indicate?

An area that shall only be used for the take off and landing of gliders.
An area that shall only be used for powered aircraft.

question: What does a white ‘T’ in the signal square of an airfield denote?

The location of the tea cabin.
Gliders will be landing at right angles to that of powered aircraft.
Two runways are simultaneously in use.
